response.summary:
I am Diego Vasquez, a Systems and Computing engineer from National University of Colombia with 8 years of experience working as a software engineer in roles such as frontend, backend, and recently as a technical lead.

My main priority is to deliver high-quality software that adds value to the business, taking ownership from user requirements definition to software design and maintainability.

On the technical side, I have mainly worked with JavaScript/Typescript technologies like NestJS, Angular, Loopback, React, and Express, as well as databases like MongoDB, Postgres, MySQL, and Redis. I have also worked with microservices under cloud providers such as AWS and Azure.
response.skills: TypeScript, Google Apps Engine, Google Maps, AngularJS, Git, PostgreSQL, Team Leadership, Software Design, Protactor, Gulp.js, Ionic Framework, Node.js, Webpack, Vtex, JSRender, JavaServer Pages, Swagger, Kibana, Express.js, Loopback

profile_positions.description:
Recently I have worked as Technical Lead of a FullStack development team, leading architecture definition processes, user story definition, driving the adoption of good practices, and creating a technical vision in the team.

My greatest achievement has been to make a transition from a purely BackEnd team to a FullStack team and to have improved burndown, carry over and defect density metrics.
profile_positions.title: NodeJS Technical Lead

profile_positions.description:
I worked at Seguros Falabella as a FullStack developer in the Internet area for the SOAT online project. In this I have worked under a microservices architecture and continuous integration. 

In this project I had the opportunity to participate in the design and implementation process of a new architecture based on the principles of a microservices architecture from a legacy project.
profile_positions.title: Full Stack Developer

profile_positions.description: In the HalloCasa project I have worked as FrontEnd developer in the migration process from a monolithic architecture based on JSP technologies to RestFul technologies, using application generators such as Yeoman for Angular and API documentation with Swagger.
profile_positions.title: Frontend Developer

profile_positions.description:
At BlackSip I worked in the area of E-Commerce platform implementation, where I have acquired knowledge about the VTEX platform and the whole process of design, implementation, deployment and operation of an online store.

One of my greatest achievements in BlackSip has been to streamline much of the development process through a framework that allows automating much of the basic functionality of an E-Commerce through a system of highly flexible and configurable modules. This was achieved thanks to the use of technologies such as NodeJS, Gulp, JSRender, Webpack and a strong teamwork.
profile_positions.title: Frontend Developer SSr

profile_positions.description: In La Cadena Retail I worked in the FrontEnd part of the automated treasury project, I have acquired a great variety of enriching knowledge in this project, among the most outstanding are: unit testing with Jasmine, end-to-end testing with Protractor, package management with Bower and task management with Gulp.
profile_positions.title: Frontend Developer

profile_positions.description:
In Servinformación I had the opportunity to work on the development of a demo for the future project of the Portal Geográfico Nacional. Together with Lateckno I have actively participated in the application of prevention, care and risk mitigation Eriskco in the FrontEnd part.

My work experience in this company has allowed me to acquire new knowledge in areas such as FrontEnd development, Scrum Methodology, Google technologies (Google Maps, Google Apps Engine, Google Maps for Work), geospatial concepts and version control.
profile_positions.title: Frontend Developer Jr

company.name: Klika Tech, Inc
company.description:
Klika Tech designs, builds, deploys, and manages edge-to-cloud IoT, Cloud, DevOps and Artificial Intelligence/Machine Learning (AI/ML) solutions for our global customers. Launched in 2013, we are a global company headquartered in the U.S., with offices in North and South America, Europe, and Central Asia. We specialize in building advanced solutions for smart living, automotive, smart mobility, industrial, manufacturing, connected healthcare, retail, agriculture, asset tracking, and logistics. We are an AWS Advanced Consulting Partner, AWS IoT, AWS DevOps and AWS Digital Customer Experience Competency Partner with AWS Service Validations in AWS IoT Core Delivery, AWS IoT Greengrass Delivery, Amazon API Gateway Delivery, AWS CloudFormation Delivery, and AWS Lambda Delivery. 

Klika Tech joined the diversified portfolio of Quext companies (www.onequext.com) in 2023 after a multi-year relationship focused on the development of innovative IoT and Cloud solutions tailored to the multi-family housing industry.

Klika Tech continues to operate independently and remain focused on continued growth in core vertical markets with end-to-end IoT and Cloud-native solutions, the attraction and retention of top talent globally, serving the needs of existing clients and attracting new clients. 

For details visit www.klika-tech.com and contact us to discuss your digital transformation needs.
